definition: namely/that is/i.e./prompt/at once/at present/even if/prompted (by the occasion)/to approach/to come into contact/to assume (office)/to draw near
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
to face/to overlook/to arrive/to be (just) about to/just before

sentences.english: Week -long national day is coming. I'm looking forword to seeing Yun who was my good classmate at college.
sentences.chinese: 十一长假即将来临，万分期待着大学同学赟的到来。

sentences.english: So here's to the impending revolution in biology. Come Darwin's 300th anniversary there will be even more to celebrate.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我们预祝即将来临的生物学革命。当达尔文诞生

sentences.english: A new world will hang about.
sentences.chinese: 一个新的世界即将来临。

sentences.english: I feel a thunderstorm is brewing. Do you see the sheet-lightning there?
sentences.chinese: 恐怕暴雨即将来临，您看见那边打闪了吗？

sentences.english: Those black clouds betoken a storm.
sentences.chinese: 那些黑云预示著暴风雨即将来临。

sentences.english: Second, the Mid-Autumn festival is coming, especially in the market shortage of maotai liquor.
sentences.chinese: 其次，中秋即将来临，茅台酒在市场上尤为紧缺。

sentences.english: By the time that happens, a storm is imminent.
sentences.chinese: 一旦形成了云或雨后，就意味着风暴即将来临。

sentences.english: Leaves have already started to colour; it will soon be winter.
sentences.chinese: 树叶已开始变色，冬季即将来临。

sentences.english: The news of the impending storm sobered them down.
sentences.chinese: 关于暴风雨即将来临的消息使他们冷静下来。

sentences.english: The typhoon is coming, but we still decide to go picnicking anyway.
sentences.chinese: 台风即将来临，但不管怎样我们仍决定去野餐。

sentences.english: To guard against the upcoming cold, you need more than just makeup to survive.
sentences.chinese: 想抵挡即将来临的寒冷，不能只靠化妆品来过秋。

sentences.english: Gathering clouds announced the oncoming storm.
sentences.chinese: 聚云预示了即将来临的风暴。

sentences.english: The sailors provided against the coming storm by furling all sails .
sentences.chinese: 水手们收起全部船帆，以防备即将来临的暴风雨。

sentences.english: We're coming up on election time, and he has been repeatedly stymied by congress.
sentences.chinese: 选举季即将来临，但奥巴马总统却一直受到国会掣肘。

sentences.english: An upcoming trip proves to be life-changing in positive ways.
sentences.chinese: 一次即将来临的旅行，将用正面方式证明生命的改变。

definition: to be about to arrive/to be around the corner
on the eve of/to be about to/to be on the verge of
on this (occasion)/at this time when .../on this occasion
to invade/(of a storm etc) to strike/to hit
